result.name: periodic-safety-update-reports-from-marketing-authorisation-holders-about-pharmacovigilance-dat
result.notes: Documents submitted by companies as part of their regulatory obligations, summarising all adverse events reported in a predefined period.

organization.name: veterinary-medicines-directorate
organization.title: Veterinary Medicines Directorate
organization.description:
The Veterinary Medicines Directorate (VMD) protects animal health, public health and the environment.

VMD is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs.

Read more at https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/veterinary-medicines-directorate/about

result.title: Periodic Safety Update Reports from Marketing Authorisation holders about pharmacovigilance data on their products

extras.value: As well as listing all the reports, the companies provide us with sales data in order to allow the calculation of incidence of adverse events.This information is confidential, although the resulting incidence figures obtained using this information provide a useful way to communicate relative risks which we will be utilising.
